articles.title: YouTube to test AI-powered age verification system for US users
articles.summary: YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.
articles.translated_title: YouTube to test AI-powered age verification system for US users
articles.translated_summary: YouTube on Wednesday will begin testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. that relies on artificial intelligence to differentiate between adults and minors, based on the kinds of videos that they have been watching.

articles.title: AI Powers Green-Tech Surge
articles.summary: Green firms in the US have found something of a lifeline inÂ artificial intelligenceÂ after being bogged down by high interest rates,Â shrinking fundingÂ and, more recently, President Donald Trumpâ€™s sharpÂ rollback of support. Clean technology companies that have inked deals to support data centers have seen their stocks soar this year, outperforming the S&P 500.. Even as some clean energy firms struggle to convince investors that they can thrive during Trumpâ€™s second term, the AI-driven surge in electric demand â€” the most in decades â€” is providing clear tailwinds for others.Â  KR Sridhar, Bloom Energy, founder and CEO tells Bloomberg Businessweek Daily says AI will drive the need for energy, including fuel cells. (Source: Bloomberg)

articles.title: Illinois bans AI therapy as some states begin to scrutinize chatbots
articles.summary: Illinois banned therapists from using artificial intelligence to treat patients, joining a small group of states regulating the use of AI chatbots for mental health.
articles.translated_title: Illinois bans AI therapy as some states begin to scrutinize chatbots

articles.title: Indiaâ€™s First AI Unicorn Fractal Files for $560 Million IPO
articles.summary: Fractal Analytics, a provider of artificial intelligence and analytics services, filed for an initial public offering in Mumbai that could value the company at more than $3.5 billion.

articles.title: Study: AI programs might help ER overcrowding in hospitals
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence programs can help doctors and nurses predict hours earlier which ER patients will likely require hospital admission, a new study says.
articles.translated_title: Study: AI programs might help ER overcrowding in hospitals

articles.title: YouTube testing a new age verification system in the U.S.
articles.summary: YouTube is ready to start testing a new age-verification system in the U.S. using artificial intelligence to distinguish between adults and minors based on their viewing habits.
articles.translated_title: YouTube testing a new age verification system in the U.S.

articles.title: AI search firm Perplexity makes $34.5 billion surprise bid for Google Chrome
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence search company Perplexity has made an unsolicited, $34.5 billion offer to purchase Googleâ€™s Chrome browser, a surprise move by a Google Search challenger thatâ€™s looking to upend how people find information online.

articles.title: Lawyer for CHA who used ChatGPT sanctioned in separate case
articles.summary: Cook County Circuit Court Judge William Sullivan sanctioned attorney Danielle Malaty with a fine of $10 on July 16 for her improper use of artificial intelligence.
articles.translated_title: Lawyer for CHA who used ChatGPT sanctioned in separate case

articles.title: Judge rejects Anthropic bid to appeal copyright ruling, postpone trial
articles.summary: A federal judge in California has denied a request from Anthropic to immediately appeal a ruling that could place the artificial intelligence company on the hook for billions of dollars in damages for allegedly pirating authors' copyrighted books.
articles.translated_title: Judge rejects Anthropic bid to appeal copyright ruling, postpone trial
